name: Customer Workshops
desc: In collaboration with customers, I have designed various concepts for SAPUI5 solutions, websites and mobile applications for Android and iOS in multiple workshops.

name: Conception
desc: I design creative solutions with individual customer requirements as an important step between the requirement analysis and the designing process.

name: UX/UI-Design
desc: As a UX/UI designer, I create digital experiences that are visually appealing, functional and easy to use. Understanding user needs and combining it with intuitive design, I strive to enhance usability and user satisfaction.

name: Interactive prototyping
desc: I use Adobe Xd to design high-fidelity, comprehensive and interactive prototypes. These provide not only the basis for customer meetings but also the development template for the implementation of the application.

name: Web Dev
desc: In addition to designing, I also develop responsive websites for all screen sizes. I develop solutions using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript and React, as well as additional frameworks such as Primereact, Bootstrap, Tailwind etc.

name: Data analysis
desc: With Microsoft Power BI, I design data models, create databases and carry out data modelling and analyses, which are presented in a visually appealing and interactive way using reports and dashboards.
